name: Don’t Touch The Color Line Switch Platform - Tap To Shoot The Falling Color Balls
name_original: Don’t Touch The Color Line Switch Platform - Tap To Shoot The Falling Color Balls
description:
—————It’s too typical and difficult as you need to try harder to survive longer—————


“Don’t Touch The Color Line Switch Platform - Tap To Shoot The Falling Color Balls” is one of the best casual game. A fresh take on the classic casual gameplay that would relieve your stress.

This is not the relaxing shooter game that you might expect! It’s far beyond difficult to sustain because as you move further it goes faster!!

How to play:

• Swipe to move

Hold on and see how much you can score.

Don't forget to log into Game Centre to see where you rank in the charts.


Cool gameplay for your casual hours!!
